/*-- Reset CSS --*/ a,abbr,acronym,address,applet,b,big,blockquote,body,caption,center,cite,code,dd,del,dfn,div,dl,dt,em,fieldset,font,form,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,html,i,iframe,img,ins,kbd,label,legend,li,object,p,pre,q,s,samp,small,span,strike,strong,sub,sup,table,tbody,td,tfoot,th,thead,tr,tt,u,ul,var{padding:0;margin:0;border:0;outline:0;vertical-align:baseline;background:0 0;text-decoration:none;font-family:var(--body-font)!important;}dl,ul{list-style-position:inside;list-style:none}.halaman ul li{list-style:disc;margin-left:20px}ul li{list-style:none}caption{text-align:center}img{border:none;position:relative}a,a:visited{text-decoration:none}.clearfix{clear:both}.section,.widget,.widget ul{margin:0;padding:0}a{color:$(body.link.color)}a img{border:0}abbr{text-decoration:none}.CSS_LIGHTBOX{z-index:999999!important}.CSS_LIGHTBOX_ATTRIBUTION_INDEX_CONTAINER .CSS_HCONT_CHILDREN_HOLDER > .CSS_LAYOUT_COMPONENT.CSS_HCONT_CHILD:first-child > .CSS_LAYOUT_COMPONENT{opacity:0}.separator a{clear:none!important;float:none!important;margin-left:0!important;margin-right:0!important}#Navbar1,#navbar-iframe,.widget-item-control,a.quickedit,.home-link,.feed-links{display:none!important}.center{display:table;margin:0 auto;position:relative}.widget > h2,.widget > h3{display:none}.widget iframe,.widget img{max-width:100%}
/*-- Body Content CSS --*/ :root{--body-font:$(main.font.family);--title-font:$(title.font.family);--meta-font:$(meta.font.family);--text-font:$(text.font.family)} button,input,select,textarea{font-family:var(--body-font);-webkit-appearance:none;-moz-appearance:none;appearance:none;outline:none;box-sizing:border-box;border-radius:0} body{position:relative;background-color:$(body.background.color);background:$(body.background);font-family:var(--body-font);font-size:14px;color:$(body.text.color);font-weight:400;font-style:normal;line-height:1.4em;word-wrap:break-word;margin:0;padding: 0px !important;} body.background-cover{background-attachment:fixed;background-size:cover;background-position:center center;background-repeat:no-repeat} .arab{direction:arab} .no-items.section{display:none} h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{font-family:var(--title-font);font-weight:700} ::-webkit-scrollbar{height:6px;width:6px;background:#fff} ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background-color:$(header.bg2);-moz-border-radius:10px;border-radius:10px}
#outer-wrapper{position:relative;width:100%;max-width:100%;background-color:$(outer.bg);overflow:hidden;margin:0 auto;padding:0} .floating-mode:not(.boxed) #outer-wrapper{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);box-shadow:none} .boxed #outer-wrapper{max-width:calc($(row.width) + 50px);box-shadow:0 0 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)} .lebar{width:$(row.width)} #content-wrapper{position:relative;float:left;width:100%;overflow:hidden;margin:10px auto;padding:15px 0;margin-top: 50px;border-top:0} #content-wrapper > .container{margin:0 auto} #main-wrapper{position:relative;float:left;width:calc(100% - ($(sidebar.width) + 25px));box-sizing:border-box;padding:0}
#headerkanan{width:100%;overflow-y:auto;overflow-x:hidden;border-radius:10px;background:#dbe8ff} .jarakatas{float:left;height:5px;width:100%} ul.subbotton,ul#dropdown{margin:0 5px} .subbotton li{z-index:3;background:#dffff2;float:left;padding:0;box-shadow:0 2px 5px rgba(23,23,23,.33);transition:all 0.3s ease;display:block;width:29%;border-radius:10px;-moz-border-radius:0;border:0;margin:5px} .subbotton li a,#dropdown li a{text-align:center;margin:10px 0;height:60px;width:80%;float:left;padding:0 8px;color:#192b3d;text-decoration:none;display:inline-block;font-weight:500;line-height:1;font-size:12px;text-transform:none} .subbotton li a svg{width:100%;height:24px;vertical-align:-5px;margin:5px 0;background-repeat:no-repeat!important;content:''} #dropdown li{background:#fff;float:left;padding:0;box-shadow:0 2px 5px rgba(23,23,23,.33);display:block;width:29%;border-radius:10px;-moz-border-radius:0;border:0;margin:5px} #dropdown li a svg{width:100%;height:24px;vertical-align:-5px;margin:5px 0;background-repeat:no-repeat!important;content:''} #dropdown > li > a:hover > svg{animation:rubberBand 1s} .waves-effect > .webdesain > a:hover > svg{animation:rubberBand 1s} .waves-effect > .microsoft > a:hover > svg{animation:rubberBand 1s} .waves-effect > .desain > a:hover > svg{animation:rubberBand 1s} .closebtn{width:22%;position:relative;margin:0 auto;margin-bottom:25px;font-size:25px;border-radius:20px;color:#ffffff;cursor:pointer} .closebtn:after{content:"\f057";font-family:'Font Awesome 5 Free';font-weight:900;margin:8px} #submenu li{background:#fff;float:left;padding:0;box-shadow:0 2px 5px rgba(23,23,23,.33);transition:all 0.3s ease;display:block;width:44%;border-radius:10px;-moz-border-radius:0;border:0;margin:5px} #submenu li a svg{width:50px;height:50px;vertical-align:-5px;margin:5px 0;background-repeat:no-repeat!important;content:''} #submenu li a{text-align:center;margin:10px 0;height:80px;width:90%;float:left;padding:0 8px;color:#192b3d;text-decoration:none;display:inline-block;font-weight:500;font-size:13px;text-transform:none} #desain,#microsoft,#webdesign{display:none} #submenu{scrollbar-width:none} #submenu::-webkit-scrollbar{display:none} #submenu{float:none;transition:all .4s ease-in-out;width:100%;overflow-y:auto;overflow-x:hidden;position:relative;top:-365px;left:-350px;z-index:5;height:320px;margin-bottom:-365px;padding-top:10px;border-radius:10px;background:#acc2e8d1;padding-left: 5px;padding-bottom:40px} .entry-content-wrap pre{border-left:5px solid $(header.bg2);margin:.5em auto;background:#292E34;hyphens:none;line-height:1.5em;display:block;color:#BFBF90;padding:10px;font-size:12px;white-space:pre;overflow:auto;max-height:250px;user-select:text;-webkit-user-select:text;-khtml-user-select:text;-moz-user-select:text;-ms-user-select:text;user-select:text} .entry-content-wrap pre::-webkit-scrollbar,pre::-moz-scrollbar,pre code::-webkit-scrollbar,pre code::-moz-scrollbar,code::-webkit-scrollbar,code::-moz-scrollbar{display:none} pre font{color:#BFBF90} pre mark,code mark,pre code mark{background-color:#ff7257!important;color:#ffffff!important;padding:2px 5px;border-radius:7px;margin:0} .entry-content-wrap code {user-select:text; -webkit-user-select:text; -khtml-user-select:text; -moz-user-select:text; -ms-user-select:text; user-select:text;} .entry-content-wrap code.tutor {color:#f44336; letter-spacing:-0.3px}
